attributes.additional_details: Bulletproof Gymwear, a manufacturer of excellent gym appreal, are refusing to make their cool range of caps in a Flexfit range. This leaves us older lifters only one option, buy a SnapBack! This then forces us to wear this flat peaked cap at a jaunty angle making us look like a twat and being subjected to ridicule by our fellow gym goers! This blatant and outrageous discrimination must stop, now, we the people demand it!!!!!
